titles.title: A bill to designate the New River Gorge National River in the State of West Virginia as the "New River Gorge National Park and Preserve", and for other purposes.
New River Gorge National Park and Preserve Designation Act
New River Gorge National Park and Preserve Designation Act
New River Gorge National Park and Preserve Designation Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
New River Gorge National Park and Preserve Designation Act
This bill redesignates the New River Gorge National River in West Virginia as the "New River Gorge National Park and Preserve."
